department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch:
教育學生應用C語言於數值計算、模擬與分析，數值計算、模擬與分析問題包含。
1.Interpolating polynomials
2.Numerical differentiation and numerical integration
3.Curve-fitting by least squares
4.Fourier series
5.Fast Fourier transform
6.Spectral applications: convolution and correlation
7.Filters and windows
8.( Introduction to modern spectrum analysis )
goal.en:
Educate the students how to program C and/or MATLAB languages for numerical simulations and analyses including:
1.Interpolating polynomials
2.Numerical differentiation and numerical integration
3.Curve-fitting by least squares
4.Fourier series
5.Fast Fourier transform
6.Spectral applications: convolution and correlation
7.Filters and windows
8.( Introduction to modern spectrum analysis )
